sentences.sContent: Factory with consummate skill, good reputation, good service, won the praise and trust of our customers, business across the country.
sentences.sContent_eng: Factory with consummate skill, good reputation, good service, won the praise and trust of our customers, business across the country.
sentences.sCn: 本厂以精湛的技艺、良好的信誉、周到的服务，深得广大客户的好评和信赖，业务遍布全国各地。 %。

sentences.sContent: Combining with its practice, this article draws lessons from the experiences of Japanese examinational committee, and brings out some suggestions to consummate the system.
sentences.sContent_eng: Combining with its practice, this article draws lessons from the experiences of Japanese examinational committee, and brings out some suggestions to consummate the system.
sentences.sCn: 本文结合人民监督员制度运行的实践，借鉴日本检察审查会制度的经验，就完善人民监督员制度提出构想。

remMethod.val: con + sum(总数) + mate → 总数的， 全数的 → 完全的

words.tran: 保护消费者利益运动；用户至上主义
圆满成功；完成；成就；达到极点

trans.tranOther: to make something complete, especially an agreement
